ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ نَفْقِدُ صُوَاعَ ٱلْمَلِكِ وَلِمَن جَآءَ بِهِۦ حِمْلُ بَعِيرٍ وَأَنَا۠ بِهِۦ زَعِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'We're missing the goblet of the king. The man who brings it will get a camel's load. Regarding that I stand as guarantor.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We cannot find the master's goblet. Whoever comes up with it will be given a camel-load of grain; I vouch for it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The officials said: "We have lost the king's cup." (And their chief added): "He who brings it shall have a camel-load of provisions, I guarantee that."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They were told, "The King's drinking cup is missing and whoever brings it will receive a camel's load of grain. I promise you that".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “We cannot find the king’s cup, and for him who brings it is a camel-load, and I am its guarantor.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "We have lost the bowl of the king and for him who produces it is (the reward of) a camel load; and I will be bound by it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: We miss the king's drinking cup, and he who shall bring it shall have a camel-load and I am responsible for it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'We are missing the king's goblet. Whoever brings it shall receive a camel's load; that I guarantee.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: We have lost the king's cup, and he who bringeth it shall have a camel-load, and I (said Joseph) am answerable for it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We miss the royal measuring bowl," he replied. "He who brings it shall have a camel-load of corn. I pledge my word for it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: we miss the king's cup; and for him who bringeth it shall be a camel-load; and thereof I am a guarantor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘We miss the king’s goblet.’ ‘Whoever brings it shall have a camel-load [of grain],’ [said the steward], ‘I will guarantee that.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "We miss the great beaker of the king; for him who produces it, is (the reward of) a camel load; I will be bound by it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "We have missed the (golden) bowl of the king and for him who produces it is (the reward of) a camel load; I will be bound by it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We are missing the goblet of the king' he replied. 'Whosoever restores it shall have a camelload, that I guarantee'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “We are missing the king’s goblet. Whoever brings it will have a camel-load; and I personally guarantee it.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "We are missing the measure of the king. And for he who produces it is [the reward of] a camel's load, and I am responsible for it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [12:72] They said, ‘We are missing the king’s goblet, [his] cup. And he who brings it shall have a camel’s load, of food [supplies], and I will guarantee that’, the [camel’s] load.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said: We have lost) we are looking for (the king's cup) in which he drinks and also uses for measurement. This cup is made of gold and I am being accused of stealing it, (and he who bringeth it shall have a camel load, and I (said Joseph) am answerable for it) I guarantee a camel load for him. All this was said by the youth whom Joseph had sent after his brothers.
